dataset.title: Aves of wetlands and protected forests in Benin

creator.organizationName: Laboratory of Forest Sciences. University of Abomey-Calavi

abstract.para: This dataset holds birds species occurrences. It has been elaborated in the framework of the project BID-AF2015-0044-SMA funded by the European Union. The information was collected mainly from littérature and some contacts with the data holders were established to give more precise data

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License.

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: This dataset holds birds species occurrences. It has been elaborated in the framework of the project BID-AF2015-0044-SMA funded by the EurOpean Union. The information was collected mainly from littérature and some contacts with the data holders were established to give more precise data.

contact.organizationName: Laboratory of Forest Sciences. University of Abomey-Calavi

project.title: Gathering of biodiversity data on bird species for their sustainable management in Benin

funding.para: The project is funded by the European Union through Biodiversity Information Development (BID) Programme

descriptor.name: generic
descriptor.descriptorValue: Mobilization of data on bird species found in Benin

description.para: The project aims to contribute to the conservation of bird species in Benin through the enhancement of data availability on these species

gbif.citation: GANGNIBO C, GBETOHO J A (2017). Aves of wetlands and protected forests in Benin. Laboratory of Forest Sciences (University of Abomey-Calavi). Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/8kuint accessed via GBIF.org on 2020-04-22.
